casebody.data:
CONNECTICUT COALITION AGAINST MILLSTONE ET AL. v. ARTHUR J. ROCQUE, JR., COMMISSIONER OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, ET AL. Nancy Burton, in support of the petition. Elizabeth C. Barton, Harold M. Blinderman and Sharon M. Seligman, in opposition. Decided November 6, 2002

VERTEFEUILLE, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.
